0.Negative_Review: The one lift s door did not close properly on the inside and there were no sign on the door to alert the guests in the hotel about it
0.Positive_Review: The room was very neat and clean and the breakfast was great The hallways were quiet and concierge service amazing A big thumbs up for the guy that assisted us though he was just a mere 2 weeks on the job

1.Negative_Review: We wanted an accomodation with car parking opportunity and it was shown that there is however when we arrived they said that no parking place left and we had to go quite far with the car our room was not ready although we arrived after 15 00 we had to wait almost 1 hour The staff is not enough for this hotel it seemed at the delay of room cleaning no problem with the quality only with timing and also at breakfast they tried everything however more staff was needed
1.Positive_Review: Clean room perfect location Breakfast was ok Good price

2.Negative_Review: We didn t find many suitable places to eat in the immediate vicinity but that may be that we didn t spend enough time looking
2.Positive_Review: I liked the attitude of the staff and the rooms were very spacious

3.Negative_Review: A bit old furnishing but it s not a problem the hotel has the classical Vienna style No bottled water in the room
3.Positive_Review: Very good breakfast fresh bread good coffee Comfortable room underground and tram stations nearby lots of parking places around the hotel free on weekends Cofee and tea set in the room

4.Negative_Review: We were at this hotel three years ago and it was really good But this time everything has changed Breakfast is complete chaos No cups tables not clean obviously understaffed You have to ask for soap toilet paper tissues and even teabags The quality is equivalent to a two star hotel or lower We visit Vienna frequently but don t offer us this hotel again never again

5.Positive_Review: A very nice hotel in a convenient location for the trams Also within walking distance to the centre if you enjoy walking which we do Excellent breakfast Lovely big room and comfy bed

6.Negative_Review: As already noted by others WiFi could be improved Kitchen smell at the groud and lower floors however there was no smell at all in the room Yet some ventilation could be improved to prevent such an experience in some areas rooms
6.Positive_Review: Great location close to metro and even closer to tram going directly to the center Clean and tidy excelent breakfast Gym in the hotel did not use however

7.Negative_Review: In the Lobby corridors and breakfast area there was a strong terrible annoying smell of fried cooking oil
7.Positive_Review: The bed was comfy and bathroom big and very clean

8.Negative_Review: Fresh coffee rather than coffee machines would ve been nice
8.Positive_Review: Lovely large rooms clean and good beds and bathrooms Great setting for breakfast in the dining room

9.Negative_Review: 1 The BED WAS HORRIBLE a bad quality mattress that was very old I could feel every spring inside As a result I had back pains every morning And I m too young to have back pains 2 The WIFI was either completely unavailable or very slow I had trouble accessing my email and basic websites
9.Positive_Review: 1 The hotel is within walking distance from several major attractions and public transport trains and trams 2 The room is large

10.Negative_Review: Bathroom doesn t really have much space to put out your things but given that the building is bit older I don t think that there is anything to be done about it Also the elevators were a bit slow
10.Positive_Review: Staff was very friendly and excellent Bed was extra comfortable Free wi fi Food in the restaurant is great very tasty and the portions are really big

11.Negative_Review: There was no garbage basket in the room They did not put new tea or coffee bags every day in fact last 2 days of my stay they did not put any
11.Positive_Review: Very helpful front desk employees Near tram and metro stations Near to nice and not expensive food shops

12.Negative_Review: WiFi was terrible we tried to ask for help on the reception but unfortunately they couldn t help us
12.Positive_Review: Position of hotel was perfect metro station is few minutes away from hotel Clean and comfortable room

13.Negative_Review: Very bad wifi Sometimes I couldn t use viber for write messages When we arrived I looked for hairs in the bath Dirty glasses and cups aren t cleaned every day
13.Positive_Review: Very kindly staff on the breakfast and reception Smoking area in quite small courtyard Supermarket and public transport stop are less than 100 meters

14.Negative_Review: Some disturbing soft noise in the room
14.Positive_Review: Nice and clean room Tasty breakfast kind personnel and very good location near U bahn We were very satisfied

15.Negative_Review: The only thing that bothered me was the kitchen smell that was present all over the main public of the hotel I mean it was bad so bad that after breakfast on Sunday my clothes and my hair smelled of food It s a ventilation problem I think They should do something about it because the hotel is very nice But the smell of fried food is not a pleasant lobby perfume
15.Positive_Review: The hotel is right next to the Franz Josef train station near a U4 metro station aprox 3 minutes walking and a D line tram station which goes in the centre There are some shops a Billa a DM some smaller shops and a few bars and restaurants near It is a good area in my opinion not very close to the centre but it s a nice area Our room 421 was big clean and quiet There are coffee and tea making facilities in the room The staff is very helpful and friendly The breakfast was plentiful

16.Negative_Review: No WiFi in the room Super cold bathroom with no heating system One big bed is in fact created from two small ones
16.Positive_Review: Super nice hotel stuff Amazing breakfast Good underground connection to center

17.Negative_Review: The breakfast could have been a little more varied changing more often we stayed 5 nights The tap had a bit of a drip The bed could have been a little firmer It wasn t a double bed but two singles pushed together
17.Positive_Review: Friendly staff Good quality bread for breakfast each morning Quiet and warm room Not in centre but in easy access to centre via tram metro

18.Negative_Review: Old bathroom and no shower only a bathtub Worn off carpets and furniture Questionable and ugly electric wiring behind the desk
18.Positive_Review: Breakfast was good and diversified Long breakfast hours until 11am on the weekend Friendly and helpful staff Booked only 2 days up front which resulted in a very good price considering the included breakfast and the location of the hotel

19.Negative_Review: 1 Arrived 10 30pm Friday bar just closed no prospect of a drink Minibar poor substitute 2 Disappointing hot breakfast options not recommended 3 Minibar not kept stocked up
19.Positive_Review: The hotel reception staff were extremely helpful with a directions general advice b tickets c electrical problems

20.Negative_Review: The staff was not helpful The WIFI was not working in the room No electric sockets near the bed in ALL hotel rooms The Hot water was not working in the bathroom they promised to send a technician but no one come to help me Really SHAME
20.Positive_Review: The location of the Hotel The Breakfast

21.Negative_Review: The breakfast compare to the value could be better but generally everything was ok
21.Positive_Review: nice location very close to Metro station Mr Petros was kind enough to give us all the information we need He is excellent

22.Negative_Review: Wifi was spotty old mattresses in rooms some liftup of rooms could be in order the rooms remind me of mid 2000 s While breakfast was good the plates are small and I eat the lot and the attendant watched me like a hawk every time I helped myself at the buffet Felt a bit uncomfortable
22.Positive_Review: Friendly and helpful front desk staff large room clean bathroom The location is near train station but you have to walk 5 minutes to Metro Green line There is a supermarket right in front of the hotel so you can stock up on some basics like soda snacks etc

23.Negative_Review: 1 Breakfast choices could be better 2 Bed a too firm 3 One of our bedrooms was too cold on arrival the other too Hot 4 Generally the whole hotel was too hot 5 Toilets were not cleaned thoroughly 6 Cleaners and Potters just walking into your room at odd times
23.Positive_Review: 1 The room sizes were good 2 Location

24.Negative_Review: Hotel was too hot WiFi slow and not seemingly working in all rooms Pillows too large Asked for double and had two singles joined
24.Positive_Review: Very helpful staff Large room executive Good bed Not that close to centre walkable 25 mins but well connected especially on tram D

25.Negative_Review: The bathrooms have no hooks to hang used towels which was slightly inconvenient We also had some problems after our first night with the cleaner obviously not being aware of what their job entailed the hotel only opened three days earlier so I expect this will improve The big pillows in the beds are lovely for sitting up to read or watch TV but I would have welcomed smaller extra pillows for sleeping to be made available as well
25.Positive_Review: The staff was lovely and very helpful Breakfast was excellent The beds were comfortable and the room was lovely Our bedroom had windows that open radiator you can control yourself and heavy blackout curtains Very nice newly refurbished bathrooms

26.Negative_Review: As the hotel staff were still working towards their official opening some basic things could have been overlooked Would be nice to provide so e bathrobes slippers waste baskets in rooms would be good Wifi was also a little unstable lost connection a few times
26.Positive_Review: The location was good Easy to get to city centre by tram Tram D station was just round the corner it was a short ride to city centre Staff was very nice helpful warm welcoming

27.Negative_Review: Didnt clean room each day staff were unhelpful and rude hotel wasnt too great

30.Negative_Review: breakfast room no real coffee not enough space to sit comfortably
30.Positive_Review: Very typical Viennese building lots of space in the room quiet nice bathroom

31.Positive_Review: Amazing place friendly stuff very comfortable bed and great locality Delicious breakfest

32.Negative_Review: more staff at breakfast to clear tables and avoid waiting
32.Positive_Review: rooms clean and comfortable close to transport links Excellent breakfast selection

33.Positive_Review: I love this hotel This was my third stay here

35.Negative_Review: Smell of oil and fries everywhere

37.Negative_Review: Old school hotel would benefit from a refurbishment

38.Positive_Review: The breakfast was nice and we got a free upgrade The staff was nice and helpful

39.Positive_Review: I was there 4 5 times in last 10 years The hotel did not changed a single thing All things are old

44.Negative_Review: WiFi performed poorly in the room
44.Positive_Review: Excellent breakfast staff nice and helpful very good connections to many parts of the city

45.Hotel_Address: Am Heumarkt 35 37 03 Landstra e 1030 Vienna Austria
45.Hotel_Name: Hotel Am Konzerthaus Vienna MGallery by Sofitel
45.Negative_Review: The only thing was the massive American tour group that took over the place but that wasn t the hotels fault
45.Positive_Review: Fantastic breakfast After traveling around Europe for over a month we found this to be the most amazing breakfast that was included They even took special orders for specialty coffee etc A real plus Also the beds and down comforters were phenomenal and overall thenplace was really quiet for being in a big city We got some much needed shuteye

46.Hotel_Address: Am Heumarkt 35 37 03 Landstra e 1030 Vienna Austria
46.Hotel_Name: Hotel Am Konzerthaus Vienna MGallery by Sofitel
46.Negative_Review: I could not use wifi diring my breakfast it is not stable Television off from international channels at 9 30 on the day of my departure
46.Positive_Review: To have bottle of water in my room and a kettle It is really lovely I made two reservations and was glad that the problem resolved quickly and without my intervention Good job

47.Hotel_Address: Am Heumarkt 35 37 03 Landstra e 1030 Vienna Austria
47.Hotel_Name: Hotel Am Konzerthaus Vienna MGallery by Sofitel
47.Negative_Review: I could not use wifi during breakfast Wifi not stable On the day of departure the French television programs were turned off at 9 30 It s too early and not practical for tourists
47.Positive_Review: Guaranteed a good level of comfort no unpleasant surprises I was delighted to find a bottle of water and a kettle in my room on arrival day I made two reservations and was glad that my problem was solved without my intervention Good Job

48.Hotel_Address: Am Heumarkt 35 37 03 Landstra e 1030 Vienna Austria
48.Hotel_Name: Hotel Am Konzerthaus Vienna MGallery by Sofitel
48.Negative_Review: There was rubbish in the bathtub when we checked in The kitchen closed at 11pm so even though we had just gotten off the plane and were hungry we couldn t eat The hotel is not located in the centre of town either so it would ve been difficult to find any food near the hotel
48.Positive_Review: Reasonably priced Easy to park Wifi connection was steady and decently fast

49.Hotel_Address: Am Heumarkt 35 37 03 Landstra e 1030 Vienna Austria
49.Hotel_Name: Hotel Am Konzerthaus Vienna MGallery by Sofitel
49.Negative_Review: Parking is a bit high at 25 Euro per day
49.Positive_Review: Excellent beds Very nice nice breakfast Space is a bit crowded but they have an excellent choice of breakfast items Staff is extremely cordial

50.Hotel_Address: Am Heumarkt 35 37 03 Landstra e 1030 Vienna Austria
50.Hotel_Name: Hotel Am Konzerthaus Vienna MGallery by Sofitel
50.Negative_Review: The location A litle far from all the main atractions in Viena Only Belvedere museum was near however there s always taxis at the door
50.Positive_Review: Bedroom clean and big Staff very helpfull specially Paul and Sofia at the front desk that were very kind the breakfast was so good that I would call it brunch

51.Hotel_Address: Am Heumarkt 35 37 03 Landstra e 1030 Vienna Austria
51.Hotel_Name: Hotel Am Konzerthaus Vienna MGallery by Sofitel
51.Negative_Review: The breakfast area was very hectic and crowded Staff did not manage to remove used plates deliver drinks and set the tables at the same time I would recommend to put also some Austrian wine in the minibar not just beer
51.Positive_Review: Comfortable accommodation opposite Akademietheater and Konzertverein lovely for music addicts during the concert season Next metro station Stadtpark is about 500 m to walk Room was big enough well equipped with tea kettle and Wifi beds were comfortable and the air condition worked very well Fresh mineral water for free every day Bathroom was also well equipped even though taking a shower caused some flooding on the floor

52.Hotel_Address: Am Heumarkt 35 37 03 Landstra e 1030 Vienna Austria
52.Hotel_Name: Hotel Am Konzerthaus Vienna MGallery by Sofitel
52.Negative_Review: All the female staff at the reception desk and in the breaksfast room were extremely helpful and friendly However two of the male staff one at reception and one in the breakfast room were not friendly and spoke abruptly to us They need to be told to be more service minded polite and friendly
52.Positive_Review: Excellent breakfast and very comfortable and light room with excellent facilities and Wifi Generally very friendly and helpful hotel staff see comment in next box

53.Hotel_Address: Am Heumarkt 35 37 03 Landstra e 1030 Vienna Austria
53.Hotel_Name: Hotel Am Konzerthaus Vienna MGallery by Sofitel
53.Positive_Review: The location is really good just in the city center The room is a bit small and facilities are a bit old but but enough for single person Staffs are very helpful and friendly

54.Hotel_Address: Am Heumarkt 35 37 03 Landstra e 1030 Vienna Austria
54.Hotel_Name: Hotel Am Konzerthaus Vienna MGallery by Sofitel
54.Positive_Review: Location is great close to subway stations and bus stops Many attentions are within walking distance Bed is really comfy

55.Hotel_Address: Am Heumarkt 35 37 03 Landstra e 1030 Vienna Austria
55.Hotel_Name: Hotel Am Konzerthaus Vienna MGallery by Sofitel
55.Positive_Review: The hotel and the staff were very pleasant friendly and helpful We had dinner and breakfast at Oskars the restaurant but wouldn t recommend this The dinner was mediocre and the breakfast poor Plenty of it but all the hot food came out of Bain Marie s and was mediocre at best The hotel is a 3 minute walk to the Koncerthaus which is very convenient if you have booked a show there

56.Hotel_Address: Am Heumarkt 35 37 03 Landstra e 1030 Vienna Austria
56.Hotel_Name: Hotel Am Konzerthaus Vienna MGallery by Sofitel
56.Positive_Review: The staff was fantastic and really went above and beyond to help out They also had computers and printers to help with check ins The location was perfect and in walking distance to all attractions in Vienna as well as the metro and train stations

57.Hotel_Address: Am Heumarkt 35 37 03 Landstra e 1030 Vienna Austria
57.Hotel_Name: Hotel Am Konzerthaus Vienna MGallery by Sofitel
57.Negative_Review: The restaurant area was a bit cramped and you felt that you were on top of each other it needed to be a bit more spacious
57.Positive_Review: The food at breakfast and dinner in the evenings was superb although a bit pricey but we couldn t fault it at all My husband enjoyed the steak and I chose the Wiener Schnitzel which were both excellent

58.Hotel_Address: Am Heumarkt 35 37 03 Landstra e 1030 Vienna Austria
58.Hotel_Name: Hotel Am Konzerthaus Vienna MGallery by Sofitel
58.Negative_Review: Very small shower for wide people One of the waitresses made a remark to people who do not speak English very well It was not very professional
58.Positive_Review: The hotel is located not far from the historical center You can walk on foot both to the shops and to the park Lovely breakfast with fresh fruit croissants cappuccino There is also a continental breakfast Comfortable bed You can have tea and coffee in the room

59.Hotel_Address: Am Heumarkt 35 37 03 Landstra e 1030 Vienna Austria
59.Hotel_Name: Hotel Am Konzerthaus Vienna MGallery by Sofitel
59.Negative_Review: The cups in the room were both dirty and full of old sugar The coffee milk was out of date and ruined the coffee tea There was black hair on the floor of my room in the bathroom and even on the sheets every day A piece of rubber band in the soup of the restaurant Room was over heated and air condition did not work Floors are worn out and bathroom in need of refurbishing Paint coming off the walls
59.Positive_Review: the variety of breakfast apfel strudel palat schinken kaiser schmarrn good tea selection and different juices Also english breakfast available The location of the hotel is handy and close to all important places walking distance

60.Hotel_Address: Am Heumarkt 35 37 03 Landstra e 1030 Vienna Austria
60.Hotel_Name: Hotel Am Konzerthaus Vienna MGallery by Sofitel
60.Negative_Review: Maybe more than the one English breakfast tea bag on offer would have been appreciated
60.Positive_Review: Very warm welcome from reception staff and extremely helpful staff in dining room for breakfast which offered a wide range to tempt the appetite The hotel proved to be well placed and we enjoyed the 10 to 15 minute walk into the city centre Our room was quiet and comfortable We could not have asked for more

61.Hotel_Address: Am Heumarkt 35 37 03 Landstra e 1030 Vienna Austria
61.Hotel_Name: Hotel Am Konzerthaus Vienna MGallery by Sofitel
61.Negative_Review: Booked Superior Room the best room the property has It was most terrible to be woken up by the sound of the hotel s elevator electrical engine every morning The noise is so intense that you can forget about sleeping between 6am and 8am The most disappointing fact is that hotel staff knows about the problem since they readily provide ear plugs but only after complaints and still continue to offer the room as the best accommodation in the property

62.Hotel_Address: Am Heumarkt 35 37 03 Landstra e 1030 Vienna Austria
62.Hotel_Name: Hotel Am Konzerthaus Vienna MGallery by Sofitel
62.Negative_Review: Bathroom was a little noisy so kept door shut not sure if it was drainage or extractor fan
62.Positive_Review: Great service Free late check out for marathon runners

63.Hotel_Address: Am Heumarkt 35 37 03 Landstra e 1030 Vienna Austria
63.Hotel_Name: Hotel Am Konzerthaus Vienna MGallery by Sofitel
63.Negative_Review: Restaurant has basic dinner with little choice Breakfast very good Service in evening restaurant leaves a lot to be desired slow forgetful inattentive
63.Positive_Review: Excellent value for money nothing to improve except restaurant

64.Hotel_Address: Am Heumarkt 35 37 03 Landstra e 1030 Vienna Austria
64.Hotel_Name: Hotel Am Konzerthaus Vienna MGallery by Sofitel
64.Positive_Review: The hotel is exactly as described perfectly located downtown but out of the heavy traffic easy to access by car The parking is in the building directly accessible by elevator elegant

65.Hotel_Address: Am Heumarkt 35 37 03 Landstra e 1030 Vienna Austria
65.Hotel_Name: Hotel Am Konzerthaus Vienna MGallery by Sofitel
65.Negative_Review: Breakfast should be included for the price of the room
65.Positive_Review: Excellent location next door to the Weiner Konzerthaus and within easy walking distance to major shopping streets and sights Fantastic will stay again

66.Hotel_Address: Am Heumarkt 35 37 03 Landstra e 1030 Vienna Austria
66.Hotel_Name: Hotel Am Konzerthaus Vienna MGallery by Sofitel
66.Negative_Review: Check in and out a bit slow only two desks we had to wait both times the room was a bit too warm
66.Positive_Review: Excellent location we went to a concert at the Konzerthaus right next door Accessible by a short walk throughnthe park from Wien Mitte train station where the airport express arrives rooms had everything we needed Staff was very friendly we got the room early in the morning

67.Hotel_Address: Am Heumarkt 35 37 03 Landstra e 1030 Vienna Austria
67.Hotel_Name: Hotel Am Konzerthaus Vienna MGallery by Sofitel
67.Positive_Review: Very comfortable bed spacious room staff very friendly and helpful especially Paul Kreiner at reception Located very close to centre for all attractions 10 minute walk Best hotel in a long time

68.Hotel_Address: Am Heumarkt 35 37 03 Landstra e 1030 Vienna Austria
68.Hotel_Name: Hotel Am Konzerthaus Vienna MGallery by Sofitel
68.Positive_Review: Pleasant hotel in the centre of Vienna All major sights are accessible by foot The staff was excellent Decent breakfast good WiFi I would be happy to return

69.Hotel_Address: Am Heumarkt 35 37 03 Landstra e 1030 Vienna Austria
69.Hotel_Name: Hotel Am Konzerthaus Vienna MGallery by Sofitel
69.Negative_Review: Floor in the room supposed to be cleaned much better And I found that plates used for corn flakes in hotel s restaurant weren t really easy to use
69.Positive_Review: Wonderful location Very convenient to get to the must seen places in Vienna It s just walking distance to airport city train station I like a style of the hotel and hospitality of hotel s staff

70.Hotel_Address: Am Heumarkt 35 37 03 Landstra e 1030 Vienna Austria
70.Hotel_Name: Hotel Am Konzerthaus Vienna MGallery by Sofitel
70.Negative_Review: Heating is set to high even if turned off in the rooms Breakfast is quite expensive
70.Positive_Review: Clean and comfortable Service is nice and helpful Very good for the price

71.Hotel_Address: Am Heumarkt 35 37 03 Landstra e 1030 Vienna Austria
71.Hotel_Name: Hotel Am Konzerthaus Vienna MGallery by Sofitel
71.Positive_Review: Everything from the moment we arrived The staff were polite and friendly Room was good size and the bed was huge Breakfast was amazing one of the best we have experienced Location is so handy for a short walk into the centre

72.Hotel_Address: Am Heumarkt 35 37 03 Landstra e 1030 Vienna Austria
72.Hotel_Name: Hotel Am Konzerthaus Vienna MGallery by Sofitel
72.Negative_Review: Location central but on a busy street Room quiet but no view
72.Positive_Review: The queensize bed was really extra comfy Breakfast was generous and fresh Staff at front desk very helpful with every wish or question I had

73.Hotel_Address: Am Heumarkt 35 37 03 Landstra e 1030 Vienna Austria
73.Hotel_Name: Hotel Am Konzerthaus Vienna MGallery by Sofitel
73.Negative_Review: The room had twin beds and lights in wrong place and strange layout as a bit cramped Think it was for a double bed or a single The TV signal kept going and difficult to navigate to channels Otherwise ok
73.Positive_Review: The location was great The dinner was very nice The room was quiet A little small for twin as layout a bit strange but for price it was very good Just think room more suited to single Very near train station and easy to find

74.Hotel_Address: Am Heumarkt 35 37 03 Landstra e 1030 Vienna Austria
74.Hotel_Name: Hotel Am Konzerthaus Vienna MGallery by Sofitel
74.Negative_Review: I had dinner on Friday evening and the waiter was at best indifferent That was the only time service was poor The breakfast staff were terrific every day as was the breakfast
74.Positive_Review: The hotel is located near everything I wanted to see within walking distance It is lovely The staff were helpful and gracious

75.Hotel_Address: Am Heumarkt 35 37 03 Landstra e 1030 Vienna Austria
75.Hotel_Name: Hotel Am Konzerthaus Vienna MGallery by Sofitel
75.Negative_Review: Too slow service at breakfast in room menu not good quality for high price several hours to take back plates even after call
75.Positive_Review: Really good tea nice bed for child convenient location nice room

76.Hotel_Address: Am Heumarkt 35 37 03 Landstra e 1030 Vienna Austria
76.Hotel_Name: Hotel Am Konzerthaus Vienna MGallery by Sofitel
76.Negative_Review: A waiting line to be seated for breakfast is unacceptable for the price we payed Especially because there were free tables so no need to hold people waiting An overall delay of almost 30 min is no good start of the day The room wasn t particularly clean either especially during the stay Overall I would expect better service for the money
76.Positive_Review: Stylish interior a comfortable room atmospheric Some nice little extra s such as little chocolates or a cup of herbal tea in the evening

77.Hotel_Address: Am Heumarkt 35 37 03 Landstra e 1030 Vienna Austria
77.Hotel_Name: Hotel Am Konzerthaus Vienna MGallery by Sofitel
77.Negative_Review: Our room window faced the street and it was a bit loud in the mornings
77.Positive_Review: Amazing breakfast The staff were extremely helpful with all of our questions We loved the location within walking distance of many of the Christmas markets

78.Hotel_Address: Am Heumarkt 35 37 03 Landstra e 1030 Vienna Austria
78.Hotel_Name: Hotel Am Konzerthaus Vienna MGallery by Sofitel
78.Negative_Review: It was mostly good though the lifts were a bit difficult to operate and the decor was a little tired but for what we paid you can t really complain

79.Hotel_Address: Am Heumarkt 35 37 03 Landstra e 1030 Vienna Austria
79.Hotel_Name: Hotel Am Konzerthaus Vienna MGallery by Sofitel
79.Negative_Review: a lot of dust in the room
79.Positive_Review: location only about 10 minutes of walk to opera round the corner from the Christmas markets staff very comfortable bed quite room

80.Hotel_Address: Am Heumarkt 35 37 03 Landstra e 1030 Vienna Austria
80.Hotel_Name: Hotel Am Konzerthaus Vienna MGallery by Sofitel
80.Negative_Review: Poor internet connection especially in the evening A very unpleasant surprise especially if your work depends on the connectivity No reasonable explanation by the stuff

81.Hotel_Address: Am Heumarkt 35 37 03 Landstra e 1030 Vienna Austria
81.Hotel_Name: Hotel Am Konzerthaus Vienna MGallery by Sofitel
81.Positive_Review: Free city tour was excellent Breakfast was very tasty with variety of food even with miso soup that I love so much and smoked salmon not together lol Staff friendly and caring Brilliant advice on city attractions ways to travel and local eateries Thank you

82.Hotel_Address: Am Heumarkt 35 37 03 Landstra e 1030 Vienna Austria
82.Hotel_Name: Hotel Am Konzerthaus Vienna MGallery by Sofitel
82.Negative_Review: More TV channels that were not just news channels Sofa in the room could be reupholstered
82.Positive_Review: Cosy hotel location was great You just have to take the City Airport Train to Mitte then it s a 10 minute walk to the hotel Very good location Buffet was really good tasty food staff were very nice Beds were comfy Chocs on your pillow every night with the weather forecast card How thoughtful

83.Hotel_Address: Am Heumarkt 35 37 03 Landstra e 1030 Vienna Austria
83.Hotel_Name: Hotel Am Konzerthaus Vienna MGallery by Sofitel
83.Negative_Review: What I liked most is the staff
83.Positive_Review: First the staff are highly professional and extremely friendly It is located in a quiet area yet within walking distance to downtown metro station and CAT The hotel has a great balance of modern and good function

84.Hotel_Address: Am Heumarkt 35 37 03 Landstra e 1030 Vienna Austria
84.Hotel_Name: Hotel Am Konzerthaus Vienna MGallery by Sofitel
84.Negative_Review: very unreliable and slow internet connection practically unusable for work heating not working even when freezing outside so temperature in the room was far from comfortable
84.Positive_Review: perfect location own easily accessible garage very good breakfast

85.Hotel_Address: Am Heumarkt 35 37 03 Landstra e 1030 Vienna Austria
85.Hotel_Name: Hotel Am Konzerthaus Vienna MGallery by Sofitel
85.Negative_Review: The breakfast service could have been better wasn t greeted at breakfast Struggled to find someone to get me a breakfast tea Could have done with a few more breakfast staff Other than that the breakfast food was good
85.Positive_Review: Great service quick check in and check out

86.Hotel_Address: Am Heumarkt 35 37 03 Landstra e 1030 Vienna Austria
86.Hotel_Name: Hotel Am Konzerthaus Vienna MGallery by Sofitel
86.Negative_Review: Nothing to suggest by way of improvements
86.Positive_Review: Convenience to Concert Halls and helpful directions for travel to locations in the city Well equipped room

87.Hotel_Address: Am Heumarkt 35 37 03 Landstra e 1030 Vienna Austria
87.Hotel_Name: Hotel Am Konzerthaus Vienna MGallery by Sofitel
87.Negative_Review: Nothing the hotel included everything we wished for
87.Positive_Review: Staff is extremely friendly room is spacious clean and very comfortable especially the bed Above all location and breakfast are excellent Exactly what you need when you visit Vienna

88.Hotel_Address: Am Heumarkt 35 37 03 Landstra e 1030 Vienna Austria
88.Hotel_Name: Hotel Am Konzerthaus Vienna MGallery by Sofitel
88.Negative_Review: The staff is outstanding but the owner or manager does not take action hat is obviously required We had one of the better rooms There was a single bed to be used as a couch with added cushions for a back rest This lack of a comfortable place to sit is not what one pays for Here it was made much worse by fact that the curtains behind the bed go to the floor and cannot be drawn unless the couch bed is away from the wall which means that when one leans back the cushions fall back Thus one must sit as on the edge of a bed This has been a problem since the room was furnished perhaps a decade ago The staff tried but there is just not a solution short of a real couch If management is not willing to do this perhaps the curtains could be hemmed so that the bed does not block pulling them closed at night

89.Hotel_Address: Am Heumarkt 35 37 03 Landstra e 1030 Vienna Austria
89.Hotel_Name: Hotel Am Konzerthaus Vienna MGallery by Sofitel
89.Negative_Review: horrid meat choices cheap juice cereal pre served in mugs with no room for milk decor not very sofitel definitely seemed like a cheaper model

90.Hotel_Address: Am Heumarkt 35 37 03 Landstra e 1030 Vienna Austria
90.Hotel_Name: Hotel Am Konzerthaus Vienna MGallery by Sofitel
90.Positive_Review: Location is perfect at the heart of the city Rooms are clean and large enough Wi fi was satisfactory And the staff was helpfull It s a perfect choice for visiting Vienna For the next visit it will be my first choice

91.Hotel_Address: Am Heumarkt 35 37 03 Landstra e 1030 Vienna Austria
91.Hotel_Name: Hotel Am Konzerthaus Vienna MGallery by Sofitel
91.Negative_Review: The personal from cleaning not performed cleaning of room does t change the things from bathroom
91.Positive_Review: The personal very professional and dedicated from restaurant on breakfast

92.Hotel_Address: Am Heumarkt 35 37 03 Landstra e 1030 Vienna Austria
92.Hotel_Name: Hotel Am Konzerthaus Vienna MGallery by Sofitel
92.Negative_Review: The food in the restaurant attached to the hotel was very poor in the evening
92.Positive_Review: Everything fantastic and the breakfast was fab I can t see why anyone would have anything bad to say

93.Hotel_Address: Am Heumarkt 35 37 03 Landstra e 1030 Vienna Austria
93.Hotel_Name: Hotel Am Konzerthaus Vienna MGallery by Sofitel
93.Positive_Review: We loved this hotel we picked it because of such high guest rating and it def lived up to that 10m of thst wall ro center close to everything We had a comfy crib in our room for baby Sheets were clean beds were comfy

94.Hotel_Address: Am Heumarkt 35 37 03 Landstra e 1030 Vienna Austria
94.Hotel_Name: Hotel Am Konzerthaus Vienna MGallery by Sofitel
94.Positive_Review: It was the 3rd time to stay at this hotel and we think it is the best choice to stay in Vienna Hotel is comfortable staff is nice breakfast is very good wifi is excellent The tram stop is in 2 minutes walk metro station is in 7 min walk Stephans Dom is in 15 minutes walk

95.Hotel_Address: Am Heumarkt 35 37 03 Landstra e 1030 Vienna Austria
95.Hotel_Name: Hotel Am Konzerthaus Vienna MGallery by Sofitel
95.Negative_Review: Breakfast zone is pretty small for such hotel Be ready to wait up to 10 minutes in lobby until they invite you
95.Positive_Review: A spacious room with a large window The most delicious breakfast we ve ever eaten at the hotel a great choice of cheeses and appetizers Easy to get there from Hauptbahnhof just 25 minutes walking through beatiful Belvedere park And most importantly on Saturdays at 10 00 am they offer free 2 hour tours through the quiet courtyards of the old town English and German languages It was very interesting

96.Hotel_Address: Am Heumarkt 35 37 03 Landstra e 1030 Vienna Austria
96.Hotel_Name: Hotel Am Konzerthaus Vienna MGallery by Sofitel
96.Negative_Review: Bathroom was ok but sorry very inconvenient toilet tub Would be good to have more modern type of sanitary equipment in the stylish hotel
96.Positive_Review: Location is excellent quite street but close to center and Belvedere tram stop is in 3 min walking Hotel is renovated with good taste Klimpt style room was spacy good cleaning very good breakfast Wi Fi was at acceptable good level Tea set in the room Staff at the reception is very friendly We did laundry and it was done in a perfect way

97.Hotel_Address: Am Heumarkt 35 37 03 Landstra e 1030 Vienna Austria
97.Hotel_Name: Hotel Am Konzerthaus Vienna MGallery by Sofitel
97.Positive_Review: Rooms with very tired and old furniture uncomfortable beds with ridiculous light fittings that get in the way of the pillows Bathrooms tiny AC ineffective Flat screen TV is a complete fabrication The TV content is poor and reception irregular Room service menu is lacking with variety Utter chaos at breakfast times Not enough space to walk safely Staff in panic Slow response to replenish food Worst Accor Brand ever experienced

98.Hotel_Address: Am Heumarkt 35 37 03 Landstra e 1030 Vienna Austria
98.Hotel_Name: Hotel Am Konzerthaus Vienna MGallery by Sofitel
98.Negative_Review: Wi Fi is very slow and needs to be upgraded
98.Positive_Review: The location is really perfect The center of Vienna is just 10 15 meters of walk distance The staff is very friendly and helpful The rooms are clean and the breakfast is also very good

99.Hotel_Address: Am Heumarkt 35 37 03 Landstra e 1030 Vienna Austria
99.Hotel_Name: Hotel Am Konzerthaus Vienna MGallery by Sofitel
99.Positive_Review: The rooms are large with very comfortable beds The breakfast was fabulous serving big variety of Viennese coffe drinks The hotel location is perfect for exploring the city you are very close to many landmarks and convenient transport connections to all directions

100.Hotel_Address: Am Heumarkt 35 37 03 Landstra e 1030 Vienna Austria
100.Hotel_Name: Hotel Am Konzerthaus Vienna MGallery by Sofitel
100.Negative_Review: The room was on the top and I add always a kind of background noise most probably from some AC engine for me it was ok since I was extremely tired and I could sleep anyway but some people may not like it The facilities are very very old and need a urgent refurbishment The TV was a smart TV from the early 00 s with a very very bad signal reception ok I was not there to watch tv but at least I would like to actually be able to watch a TV channel if I need want to If the mattress could speak she would probably tell you some good stories as it was old and used for good All these aspects are ok if you don t care too much or if we are dealing with a cheap hotel But I wasn t expecting this from a supposedly good brand I stayed in IBIS and Holiday Inn much better than this for half of the price
100.Positive_Review: The location Cleanliness and the fact that the Hotel provided instant coffee and tee you could use for your breakfast Bathroom goodies were also very good
